description: This notice is for a request for proposal for the GIS Specialist position. Please refer to the attached document for more information.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement:**
### GIS Specialist

*Lfrontend = undefined* Reference: CB-423-85621801 (Published: November 21, 2023; Closing Date: December 5, 2023 at 14:00:00)

THIS TENDER IS CLOSED FOR BIDDING 

#### Tender Details:

| Property       | Value                           |
|----------------|--------------------------------|

#### Trade Agreements:

We accept bids under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (ALECP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (PTPGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contact Information:

Ms. Heidi Gagne
Tendering Authority
235 Queen Street | John G. Diefenbaker Building Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A-0H3 | Phone: (343) 542-9135 | Email: heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca

To view the complete tender, you may download the attachment [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25417/npp-ic208153.pdf).
